new:
When you rest at the <COL ffdc78>Inn</COL>, you can heal your wounded body. 

Your health and stamina will be restored to their maximum values, and any abnormal conditions will be cured. 

The Inn can be used as a base in various locations in Lestania, so it's reassuring to know its whereabouts when traveling.
